Module jtrim.swing.property
Package org.jtrim2.property.swing

Interface GlassPaneFactory

public interface GlassPaneFactory
Defines an interface creating JPanel instances as a glass pane for Swing components (those that have glass pane).

Thread safety

Implementations of this interface can only be used from the AWT event dispatch thread (unless they allow otherwise).

Synchronization transparency

Implementations of this interface are not required to be synchronization transparent but due to being used on the AWT event dispatch thread they must avoid expensive actions.
See Also:
  • AutoDisplayState.glassPaneSwitcher(javax.swing.JLayer, GlassPaneFactory)
  • AutoDisplayState.glassPaneSwitcher(javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, GlassPaneFactory)

    Method

    JPanel
    createGlassPane()
    Creates a new JPanel instance which is to be set as a glass pane of a Swing component.

    • createGlassPane

      JPanel createGlassPane()
      Creates a new JPanel instance which is to be set as a glass pane of a Swing component.
      Returns:
      the new JPanel instance which is to be set as a glass pane of a Swing component. This method never returns null.
